attributes.action: Act to ensure that the US anti-ballistic missile defence system is not hosted on British soil.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister should act to ensure that any defence capability that the UK deploys is truly independent and wholly under British control. This applies to both offensive  and defensive capability.

This does not preclude the UK from co-operating with allies on matters of defence.  However, the British government should ensure that we are able to adequately defend our own territory alone if needed.
